title: What champs are similar to Talon?
body: Title, yeah. Just wondering for a second/third pick in case he gets banned or picked.

replies.body:
kayn is pretty much the same, 

try kled mang
I really like Akali. Try her too.

Quinn, go mid and rush lethality as you would on Talon. Laning can be difficult pre-6 but if you get a kill or two before then you can roam a bit to pick up kills. Your ult has a high mana cost at its first level however so mana management is important. Once you reach rank 2 ult this is much less of an issue.
